Sentencas: Recent work has shown that Gd-2(Ti1-xMOx)(2)O-7 (Mo doped GT) exhibits high levels of mixed conduction under reducing atmospheres, making it suitable as an anode in a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Mixed ionic and electronic conduction in Mn/Mo doped gadolinium titanate

Sentencas: It decomposes at high P-O2, however.
Titulo: Mixed ionic and electronic conduction in Mn/Mo doped gadolinium titanate

Sentencas: We have succeeded in extending the stability limits of the GT-Mo to higher P-O2 with the addition of Mn.
Titulo: Mixed ionic and electronic conduction in Mn/Mo doped gadolinium titanate

Sentencas: Our earlier studies on Gd-2((MoyMn1-y)(x)Ti1-x)(2)O-7 (GMMT) as a function of P-O2, T, and composition utilizing impedance spectroscopy and X-ray diffraction are extended to include the joint effects of variations in x and y on the conductivity and stability of the material in cathodic environments.
Titulo: Mixed ionic and electronic conduction in Mn/Mo doped gadolinium titanate

Sentencas: Defect models explaining the dependence of the partial conductivities on oxygen partial pressure, temperature and composition are also presented.
Titulo: Mixed ionic and electronic conduction in Mn/Mo doped gadolinium titanate
